com.soen6441.core.effect

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen6441.core.effect.Effect

  • public class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
    Any spatial thing which will temporarily change the AffectableValue should use this class to make it happen.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Zhe Zhao, Chenglong Zhang
    See Also:
    AffectableValue

    • Method Detail

      • strongerThan

        public boolean strongerThan(Effect effect)
        Test if this effect is stronger to another effect. The another effect should be same type as this effect in order to compare. Use getType before calling this method.
        Parameters:
        effect - Another effect, which should be same type as this one.
        Returns:
        true if this effect is stronger, false if the effect in the para is stronger or they are imcomparable. * @see #getType()

      • affect

        public void affect()
        To start the effect This method should be called after putting this object to the affectable object.
